entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
